snippet: Mun2’s presentation to advertisers for its 2013 and 2014 seasons featured new and returning reality series that centered on celebrities.
abstract: Tanzina Vega Advertising column; Mun2, owned by Telemundo Media, announces 200 hours of original programming for the 2013 and 2014 seasons in its presentation to advertisers; content will focus mainly on celebrity-infused reality shows, music and sports for young, bilingual and bicultural Latinos in the United States.
lead_paragraph: Mun2’s presentation to advertisers for its 2013 and 2014 seasons featured new and returning reality series that centered on celebrities.

headline.seo: Mun2 Relies Heavily on Reality Shows Starring Celebrities
headline.main: For the Bilingual and Bicultural, a Big Dose of American Reality
headline.print_headline: For the Bilingual and Bicultural, a Big Dose of American Reality
